comment.body:
> [balancer73](#comment_4_1PniNzyi8fygvwyBaLpA9oBDVWZ5fXuJUw): Now the upload mp4 has stopped working for me at all :) A message is issued - Only mp4, tar.gz, zip files allowed on this site.

I'm getting this after ripping a youtube video that I want to share lol

> [nofish](#comment_234_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Please try now

able to upload again but sometime the yellow finish upload button isnt showing up

A stop seeding button within zeroup would be nice save having to go into the files menu and manually removing files. If I'm seeding a completed download how much of an impact will it have on my internet speed while I've got zeronet open?

> [krixano](#comment_1_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu): @nofish: Is there a reason why you don't allow other files besides zip, tar.gz, and mp4?

I managed to upload a PDF before he put that rule in.
